title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME ASSOCIATED WITH SUBCLASSES F21K, F21L, F21S and F21V, RELATING TO USES OR APPLICATIONS OF LIGHTING DEVICES OR SYSTEMS

note.note-paragraph: This subclass constitutes an indexing scheme associated with subclasses F21K, F21L, F21S and F21V, relating to uses or applications of lighting devices or systems.

title-part.text: Exterior vehicle lighting devices for illuminating purposes

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups F21W2102/10, F21W2102/13, F21W2102/135, F21W2102/14, F21W2102/145, F21W2102/15, F21W2102/155, F21W2102/16, F21W2102/165, F21W2102/17, F21W2102/18, F21W2102/19, F21W2102/20, F21W2102/30, F21W2102/40 and F21W2105/00.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Arrangement or contour of the emitted light

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/10 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/10 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: for high-beam region or low-beam region

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/13 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/13 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: the light having cut-off lines, i.e. clear borderlines between emitted regions and dark regions

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/135 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/135 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: specially adapted for adaptive high beams, i.e. wherein the beam is broader but avoids glaring other road users

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/14 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: wherein the light is emitted between two parallel vertical cutoff lines, e.g. selectively emitted rectangular-shaped high beam

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/145 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/145 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: wherein the light is emitted under L-shaped cut-off lines, i.e. vertical and horizontal cutoff lines

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/15 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/15 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: having inclined and horizontal cutoff lines

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/155 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/155 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F21W2102/16 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/16 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: the borderlines between emitted regions and dark regions other than cut-off lines being variable

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/165 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/165 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: for regions other than high beam or low beam

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/17 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/17 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F21W2102/18 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/18 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F21W2102/19 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/19 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Illuminance distribution within the emitted light

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/20 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/20 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F21W2102/30 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/30 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: the light being emitted to facilitate access to the vehicle

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2102/40 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2102/00.
Groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2102/40 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Exterior vehicle lighting devices for signalling purposes

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2103/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups F21W2103/10, F21W2103/15, F21W2103/30, F21W2103/35, F21W2103/40, F21W2103/45, F21W2103/50, F21W2103/55, F21W2103/60 and F21W2105/00.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Projection of signs from lighting devices, e.g. symbols or information being projected onto the road

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2103/60 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F21W2103/00.
Groups F21W2103/00 and F21W2103/60 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Exterior vehicle lighting devices for decorative purposes

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2104/00 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups F21S43/00 and F21S45/00.
Groups F21S43/00, F21S45/00 and F21W2104/00 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Combinations of lighting devices covered by codes F21W2102/00 – F21W2104/00

note.note-paragraph:
Group F21W2105/00 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups F21W2102/00 and F21W2103/00.
Groups F21W2102/00, F21W2103/00 and F21W2105/00 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Use or application of lighting devices on or in particular types of vehicles
Use or application of lighting devices or systems for signalling, marking or indicating, not provided for in codes F21W2102/00 – F21W2107/00
for roads, paths or the like
for indicating kerbs, steps or stairs
for aircraft runways or the like
Use or application of lighting devices or systems for decorative purposes, not provided for in codes F21W2102/00 – F21W2107/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Candle holders for birthday or anniversary cakes
mounted on the exterior of houses or other buildings to illuminate parts thereof
for illumination or simulation of snowy or iced items, e.g. icicle
for simulation of a starry sky or firmament

title-part.text: Use or application of lighting devices or systems not provided for in codes F21W2102/00-F21W2121/00

CPC-specific-text.text: of working places, building sites or the like

title-part.text: of tunnels or the like, e.g. under bridges
Lighting for domestic or personal use

CPC-specific-text.text: for books, i.e. reading lights attachable to books

title-part.text: Lighting for industrial, commercial, recreational or military use
for theatres, stages or film studios
for inspection of the interior of hollow structures, e.g. vessels, tubes
